caption: form other sectors of the market.
cells:
Commonly uses long/short hedges. Typically controls for industry, sector, size, and other
exposures and establishes market-neutral positions designed to exploit some market inef-
ficiency. Typically deploys leverage to amplify inefficiencies.

Equity-oriented positions on either side of the market (i.e., long or short), depending on
outlook. Not meant to be market neutral; low beta may be incidental. May establish a con-
centrated focus regionally (e.g., U.S. or Europe) or on a specific sector (e.g., tech or health
care stocks). Derivatives may be used to hedge positions.

Net short position, usually in equities, as opposed to pure short exposure. In recent years,
the number of true dedicated short bias managers has dwindled.

Attempts to profit from events such as mergers & acquisitions (risk-arbitrage event driven),
regulatory changes, restructurings, bankruptcies, and reorganizations (distressed event driven),
or other litigation. Can invest across asset classes and events (multi-strategy event driven).

Attempts to profit from price anomalies in related interest rate securities. Includes interest
rate swap arbitrage, U.S. versus non-U.S. government bond arbitrage, yield-curve arbitrage,
and mortgage-backed arbitrage.

Hedged investing in convertible securities, typically long convertible bonds and short corre-
sponding stock, particularly when there is a price discrepancy in the conversion ratio.

Involves long and short positions in capital or derivative markets across the world. Portfolio
positions reflect views on broad market conditions and major economic trends.

Goal is to exploit market inefficiencies in emerging markets. Typically long only because
short-selling is not feasible in many developing markets. Can be invested across asset
classes (and currency).

Use financial, currency, or commodity futures. May make use of technical trading rules or a
less structured judgmental approach.
Opportunistic choice of strategy depending on outlook.
Fund allocates its cash to several other hedge funds to be managed.

description: form other sectors of the market. This table shows NPV sensitivity analysis across different scenarios.
table_summary: form other sectors of the market. This table shows NPV sensitivity analysis across different scenarios.
